title: Task 74

fillInTheBlank.sentence: I really like playing the guitar. I _ _ it.

blanks.feedback: Think of a casual phrase that means you really like or are interested in something.
Think of a casual phrase that means you really like or are interested in something.

description: When you want to say that you have a strong interest in something, you can use the phrase I am into it. This phrase shows what someone likes or enjoys.
